unnormalised: Arre bhai, te mhantat 15/08ak portun paus poddtolo? Fattlea vorsui, Independence Day parade dhuun geli! Kiteak na ami fuddlea vorsak utsav 14/08akuch kartole? Na zalear aik mhoje utor, 17:00 horameren, pakka vattencher udok bhorun astolem ani chai-pakora weather zatolem! ğŸ˜œğŸŒ§ï¸
normalised: Arre bhai, pandhra Augustak portun paus poddtolo mhunn sangtat? Fattle pavtim-i, Svotontratai Divsachi parade buddonk pavli! Fuddlea vorosa ami chaudha Augustak utsav adim korunk zata? Na zalear, mhaka suchoi, satra shatak pakka udkant budlele rosto ani chai-pakora haman astoli!
